Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.rules.dynamic

Interface DynamicRules

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseRules, CentaurRules, FarmerRules, KnightRules, MushroomRules, PostmanRules
public interface DynamicRules
DynamicRules class is an interface to be implemented for each of the rule type.
See Also:
  • BaseRules

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<String>
    computeIslandInfluence(Game game, Island island)
    Method computeIslandInfluence calculates the player with the maximum influence on that island, or Optional.Empty if no players have influence.
    int
    computeMotherMaxMoves(AssistantCard card)
    Method computeMotherMaxMoves returns the value of the maximum movement of MotherNature.
    EnumMap<Color,String>
    getProfessorInfluence(Game game)
    Method getProfessorInfluence checks if current round owner has the maximum influence on every color.

    • getProfessorInfluence

      EnumMap<Color,String> getProfessorInfluence(Game game)
      Method getProfessorInfluence checks if current round owner has the maximum influence on every color.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game instance
      Returns:
      the updated map of professors - players.

    • computeIslandInfluence

      Optional<String> computeIslandInfluence(Game game, Island island)
      Method computeIslandInfluence calculates the player with the maximum influence on that island, or Optional.Empty if no players have influence.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game instance reference.
      island - the reference to the island to calculate the influence on.
      Returns:
      The nickname of the new owner, empty otherwise.
      See Also:
      • KnightRules
      • CentaurRules
